front.title: Geneve applicability for service function chaining

abstract.t: This document describes the applicability of using Generic Network Virtualization Encapsulation (Geneve), to carry the service function path (SFP) information, and the network service header (NSH) metadata (MD) type 1 and type 2. The SFP information and MD types will be carried in Geneve option TLV(s).
